English:

Chocking danish Documentary about police violence against the citizens and ordinary people in the free state of Christiania(www.christiania.org). The film contains several strong scenes and should not be viewed by young children. Spread it far and wide. The film, unfortuantly does not come with english subtitles. Pehaps someone with experince and language skill could help out?
